name: Gorimon
description: Gorillamon is a bipedal, muscular gorilla-like Digimon with white fur and blue eyes. It has black skin on its face, chest, hand, right arm, and feet, and it wears several belts on its left thigh. Its right arm is mechanized, connected to its flesh with cables. The right arm leads down to the "Energy Cannon" that replaces its right hand.
